blockmeter.toggle.on: %s 現在用作您的方塊計量器！
blockmeter.showOthers: 顯示其他使用者的框線： %s
text.autoconfig.blockmeter.title: 方塊計量
text.autoconfig.blockmeter.option.minima: After 10 blocks, the labels keep their
size to improve long distance readability
text.autoconfig.blockmeter.option.delete: the keybinding to disable the blockmeter
text.autoconfig.blockmeter.option.sendBo: Sends Boxes to other users on capable Servers
Boxes can be hidden via in-game options
The server requires the Block Meter mod either
text.autoconfig.blockmeter.option.showBo: Show Boxes when Block Meter is disabled
